### Simulate the data

```{r}
set.seed(719)
data = runif(50000) %>% 
  tibble() %>% 
  rename("value" = ".")

data %>% 
  pull(value) %>% 
  hist(.)
```

```{r}
design3plus3 = function(p = c(0.017, 0.043, 0.1, 0.22, 0.41)) {
  ntox = 0
  i = 1
  j = 1
  l = 1
  res = vector(mode = "list", length = 1000)
  fin = NULL
  for (l in 1:1000) {
    while (ntox < 2 && i %in% c(1:5) && j %in% 1:16666) {
      for (k in (3*(j-1)+1):(3*(j-1)+3)) {
        ntox = if_else(pull(data, value)[[k]] < p[[i]], (ntox + 1), ntox)
        res = rbind(res, cbind(ntox, i, k, l))
      }
      if(ntox == 1) {
        for (k in (3*j+1):(3*j+3)) {
          ntox = if_else(pull(data, value)[[k]] < p[[i]], (ntox + 1), ntox)
          res = rbind(res, cbind(ntox, i, k, l))
        }
        j = j + 1
      }
      ntox = 0
      i = i + 1
      j = j + 1
    }
    fin[[l]] = res %>% 
      data.frame() %>% 
      tibble() %>% 
      unnest(cols = c(ntox, i, k, l)) %>% 
      summarize(ntox = last(ntox),
                i = last(i),
                k = last(k),
                l = last(l))
    i = 1
    j = k/3
    ntox = 0
    l = l + 1
  }
  fin = bind_rows(fin)
  return(fin)
}
```

## pi = c(0.017, 0.043, 0.1, 0.22, 0.41)

```{r, cache = TRUE}
finl_df = design3plus3()
````
```{r}
finl_df %>% 
  pull(i) %>% 
  hist(breaks = c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5))
```
